page.title: 10Hamble again five
page.content:
sailing,canoeing and rowing on it. Similar activites take place at Fairthorne Manor.An establishment which runs summer camps for outdoor minded children riverside and woodland walks are enjoyable in all weathers as is the Hampshire Farm Museum in the park.
{THE SAILING & YACHT CLUBS OF THE { HAMBLE The main Yacht clubs on the River are in the Hamble village itself,on the foreshore.They are The Royal Southern Yacht Club and the Royal Air Force Yacht Club, both very alike.They both have private clubhouses and moorings on the river for club members. Hamble River Sailing Club and Warsash Sailing Club both sail from the river ,but most races, etc take place outside the crowded river.Both the
